lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Chicago soybean complex has been nervous for some time about large South American crops developing under near ideal conditions towards record yields.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brazil's recent announcement of a suspension in interest payments on 68 billion dlrs of foreign debt gave the banking system the jitters and confirmed views among many international economists and commodities analysts that Brazil will continue to flex its trading muscles in 1987.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analysts said a key factor in Brazilian trade will be coffee, and even without background pressure from foreign creditors the world's largest producer was expected to hit the market this year with a vengeance.
